question:
You work for an international company, and would like to spend six months working in its head office in another country.
Write a letter to your manager. In your letter:

•	explain why you want to work in the company’s head office for six months

•	say how your work could be done while you are away

•	ask for his/her help in arranging it,

You should write at least 150 words.
text: I am writing to let you know that I am very interested to spend six months working in our head office in Germany. I have been part of Product management Team from past 2 years and working closely with our team in Germany. The head office have recently implemented a new ERP System. The basic objective of my trip to Germany would be to learn the functioning of new ERP system. Moreover, the company has launched new products and I would like to get in hands experience.

I have a discussion with laveen and he agreed to take up my responsibilities during my absence. Furthermore, I will check my emails regularly and would be available for emergency phone calls. Once I get back to office, I would work extra hours in order to catch up on anything I missed.
Would you kindly approve this request in order to start making the necessary arrangements.
Thank you for your help and support.
